requirements.description: The Publisher is solely responsible for publishing the App on applicable app stores such as Google Play or AppStore.
The Publisher must comply with the App Store Terms, including obtaining user consent and disclosing data collection practices.
The Publisher must provide options for users to opt-out as required by the App Store Terms.
StartApp does not guarantee that the use of the Service will comply with the App Store Terms.
StartApp is not liable for any costs or damages incurred by the Publisher due to noncompliance with the App Store Terms.
The use of the Service may necessitate additional permissions from End Users beyond what the App originally requires.
